item.title: My Bookshelf
item.description: Greetings! To start my site off, here’s the list of books I go to time and time again. Note: The links are to the books on amazon The List, in no particular order Clean Architecture Authors: Robert Martin Software Architecture, the Hard Parts Authors: Neal Ford, Mark Richards, Pramod Sadalage, Zhamak Dehghani TCP/IP Illustrated, Volume 1 Authors: Kevin Fall, W.
